description: Show logcat in an overlay NOTE: Device root (superuser) access is required to read system logs on Android 4.1 and above. Displays the device logcat buffer in a system overlay window. Features: * Persistent logcat display as a system overlay * Customisable log filters and display options * Auto filter by the current foreground Activity process * Quick access to pause/play, clear & share functions via rich notification * Integration support for non-root devices
